text: Nesmotrya na to, chto ya zhelayu vam blaga, moy sovet ne pomozhet vam, yesli Allakh pozhelayet, chtoby vy ostalis' v svoyom zabluzhdenii. Ved' On znayet nechestivost' vashikh serdets, kotoryye ne sleduyut istine. Allakh Vsevyshniy - vash Gospod'. V Den' voskreseniya k Nemu budet vashe vozvrashcheniye, i On vozdast vam za vashi deyaniya
